data.name: RPG Maker MV - Wonderland Forest Tileset
data.detailed_description:
Tumble down the rabbit hole as you go exploring the mysterious Wonderland Forest!

Wonderland Forest Tileset is a collection of tiles inspired by the classic books of Lewis Carroll. Created by Sherman3D, this pack includes the essentials you'll need to create a whimsical (and perhaps even maddening) forest. From giant mushrooms to card soldiers, Wonderland Forest Tileset is a great addition to your growing library of RPG Maker resources.

Features:
  • Basics needed to create a Wonderland-inspired forest.

  • Mushrooms, flowers and trees will spruce up any fantasy forest!

  • Material arranged for both clean and cluttered maps.
  • Created and optimized for RPG Maker MV.

data.short_description: Tumble down the rabbit hole as you go exploring the mysterious Wonderland Forest!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
